clinical_study.brief_title: The Meaning of Suicidality for Older Persons With Suicidal Tendencies and Their Families

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the proposed study is to examine the phenomenon of suicidality in old age and its unique characteristics. This will be performed through observing the multigenerational aging family from the life-course perspective, which enables the researchers to address life transitions, including crises leading to suicidal tendencies.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.measure: Understanding older persons experiencing suicidality and their families
primary_outcome.description: In-depth interviews with older persons experiencing suicidality and their families - in order to understand them.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Suicidal older persons and their families
arm_group.description: Suicidal older persons and their families will be interviewed

intervention.arm_group_label: Suicidal older persons and their families

study_pop.textblock: Aged individuals from tertiary and primary care and from the community who have experienced suicidality and their families.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Hebrew speaking
- Suicidal
- Families of elderly suicides
- Cognitive ability
Exclusion Criteria:
- All others
